body.name: Asaya Professional Knife Edge Guards -Universal Blade Covers - Extra Strength, ABS Plastic and BPA-Free Felt Lining, non-Toxic and Food Safe - Knives Not Included (6Pcs)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 5 mins
features: 🔪 UNIVERSAL KNIFE GUARD DESIGN - Created with an angled opening that can fit slanted or straight knife handles. These edge protectors are perfect for pairing, steak, boning, bread, santoku, fillet and chef knives
🔪 BPA-FREE, NON-TOXIC AND FOOD SAFE - Most knife guards are made with PVC but ExecuChef Knife guards are made with extra durable ABS plastic that is non-toxic, food safe and BPA-free.
🔪 TEXTURED FOR EXTRA GRIP - Using a unique design pattern, these blade covers provide extra grip to protect against slipping and accidental damage when skiding knives in and out of the sheath.
🔪 EXECUCHEF IS NOW ASAYA CHEF PRODUCTS! - Same great quality. New shiny name! Feel free to reach out directly if you every have any issues and we will resolve them immediately!
body.description: Asaya knife edge guards are the best in the business! Founded in 2017, Asaya Chef Products (previously ExecuChef) serves to deliver the highest quality gear for professional, amateur chefs and culinary students. All products are designed and tested in Orlando, Florida. We hope that you put these knife guards to good use and that they last you for a long time. The standard Amazon return policy is 1 month. If you have issues with the guards after that period, please contact us directly so we can help resolve them. Features Include: ✅ High quality and durable ABS plastic with an inner felt lining to protect your knives through all types of travel or wear and tear. ✅ Made with Non-Toxic, Food Safe and BPA free materials. ✅ Highly resistant to cuts, stains or abrasions. ✅ Textured for extra grip to prevent slipping. ✅ Designed to universally fit almost all, pairing, steak, boning, bread, santoku, fillet and chef knives. Give your knives the respect they deserve and transport them safely and securely with Asaya Knife Guards. Click "Add to Cart” TODAY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars little bodyguards for my precious knives
reviews.reviewText: Using them is a breeze – just slip the guard onto the blade, and knives are instantly shielded from the chaos of the kitchen. The variety of sizes means all my knives, from paring to chef's, are covered.Compared to other knife guards, these ones are top-notch. The build quality is superb, and the reinforced edge provides extra protection. No more worrying about accidentally nicking my fingers when reaching into the drawer.The best part? These guards are a savior for my blades. No more clattering against each other, no more accidental dings. They keep my knives in tip-top shape, ready for culinary action.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality knife guards.
reviews.reviewText: I’m a pro Chef and these are very good quality. I really like the soft interior of the guards the knives slide in smoothy and hold in firmly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice knife guards
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves them! Elegant color and style. Very good material. They fit the knives well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great if they happen to match your knives
reviews.reviewText: Love the sturdy quality, snug fit and sophisticated appearance. These look great and don’t seem like they’ll split or lose the soft lining with use.Only downside is I wish they had set options with fewer pieces. As it is now you can get a great deal on the huge set, not use half of them and end up trying to make some work that don’t exactly fit your knives. Or you can buy individually just the ones that do fit and pay 5x as much. Sure would be nice to have the option of some mid-priced sets of 3 or even 5 to make things a little more easily customizable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have several knifes that are all in a drawer and needed something to protect the blades. Are they an exact fit for every knife, no. Do they work and stay on? YES! Its worth the money if you value your knifes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Asaya Professional Knife Edge Guards is a good choice.
reviews.reviewText: Perfectly fit to all my knife. It is one of must haves, keep yourself safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality sleeves
reviews.reviewText: Had multiple knives in the drawer. The sleeves fit a variety of sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The felt lining adds extra protection compared to other plastic holders I have. They are also very attractive.

Awesome variety or sizes, purchased for use in a professional setting with my very large collection. Soft lining is a plus, holds onto the blade very securely, has already paid for itself when my falling knife didn’t chip/crack.

reviews.reviewerName: Mr Aaron L ShawMr Aaron L Shaw
reviews.reviewText: I'm a chef by trade and I got these to cover the knives I store in my knife-roll. I've been using them just over two months. Yesterday one of the covers split open, it was the cover to my main chefs knife. I can't initiate a refund and being in Australia a return to the US would be expensive postage.I'll have to just use gaffer tape on it to stop it splitting any more. Not impressed with the quality at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: Coworkers will line up for freebies, have to reorder!
reviews.reviewText: It's a great package. Somehow too many smaller left over. A scimitar guard would be appreciated as the blade is long and curved. I'll be purchasing again, so my co-workers don't clean me our.
Would be great if they had perforations to snap off for knives. They are snug and won't fall off when you lift them. Prefer this over a knife block that clutters counter top.
